meanings.definition: A deep blue dye obtained from the indigo plant.
meanings.sent1: The anil dye gave the fabric a rich blue color.
meanings.sent2: She used anil to dye the cloth a beautiful shade of blue.
meanings.sent3: The anil dye spilled on the floor, creating a blue mess.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled like anil under the bright sun.
meanings.sent5: The anil dye transformed the plain fabric into a stunning masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A plant of the pea family with blue flowers, also known as indigo.
meanings.sent1: The anil plant in her garden bloomed with vibrant blue flowers.
meanings.sent2: Farmers cultivate anil for its beautiful blue blossoms.
meanings.sent3: The anil plant swayed in the breeze, its blue flowers dancing.
meanings.sent4: The fields were a sea of anil, a soothing sight for the eyes.
meanings.sent5: She admired the delicate petals of the anil plant, marveling at their beauty.

meanings.sent1: The artist used anil paint to create a striking contrast in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The sky turned anil as the sun set in the horizon.
meanings.sent3: His favorite shirt was the exact shade of anil he loved.
meanings.sent4: The anil of the ocean reflected the clear sky above.
meanings.sent5: The room was painted in a calming anil hue, perfect for relaxation.
